title: Footer elements at or above 768px appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 786px
AND that footer has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN footer has 3 elements, left to right: InsideMLB logo, cluster of social media icons (Facebook, Twitter, Google+), copyright language
AND elements span the screen
AND no elements overlap each other
AND the spaces between the social media icons are equal
AND the elements are top aligned with each other
AND copyright reads: [circle c icon] 2017 Property of Major League Baseball
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19063)

title: Footer logo function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that footer has appeared
AND that InsideMLB logo has appeared within the footer
AND user is on any page in the site
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the footer logo
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the Main Page in the same tab

title: Footer Facebook icon function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is anywhere in the site
AND footer has appeared
AND Facebook icon has appeared in the footer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Facebook icon
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the MLB Facebook page loads in the new tab
AND the URL is https://www.facebook.com/mlb

title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected

title: Footer elements at or below 767px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 767px
AND footer has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN footer has 3 elements, top to bottom: InsideMLB logo, cluster of 3 social media icons (Facebook, Twitter, Google+), copyright
AND 3 elements are horizontally centered on the screen
AND 3 elements are vertically centered within the footer
AND no elements overlap each other
AND spaces between social media icons are equal
AND InsideMLB logo is right aligned with Google+ icon
AND copyright reads: [circle c icon] 2017 Property of Major League Baseball

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19377)

title: Footer Twitter icon function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is anywhere in the site
AND footer has appeared
AND that the Twitter icon has appeared in the footer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Twitter icon
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the MLB Twitter page opens in the new tab
AND the URL is https://twitter.com/mlb

title: Footer Google+ icon function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is anywhere in the site
AND footer has appeared
AND the Google+ icon has appeared in the footer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Google+ icon
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the MLB Google+ page loads in the new tab
AND the URL is https://plus.google.com/+MLB

title: Footer copyright function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that footer has appeared
AND the copyright language has appeared in the footer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the copyright language
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens -- the copyright is not linked.
